alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:40AM CST until January 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Wind chills as low as minus 25 degrees. * WHERE...Sioux and Box Butte Counties including the cities of Alliance and Harrison. * WHEN...6 AM MST this morning until 5 AM MST Thursday. Coldest temperatures expected early Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick, possibly snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in snow. Dangerously cold wind chills could lead to frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; North Sioux; South Sioux
